description: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week we're joined by Glenn Greenwald, a journalist with The Intercept, and the author of "No Place to Hide: Edward Snowden, the NSA and the U.S. Surveillance State".
title: Silicon Tally: NSA my name
teaser: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
